info.name: AQU Student Portal *Dark Neon Theme* | OsamaJT
info.description:
A Dark Theme for the students' portal site in Al-Quds University for nyctophilic people like myself 

Took a lot of time, a lot! so please appreciate it ^-^

I hope actually that someone looks for that from AQU cuz I'm not the only one, right? :')
